## ReadableSeisFluid class

Seis-based implementation of [ReadableFluid](./lib-base.readablefluid.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class ReadableSeisFluid implements ReadableFluid 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [ReadableFluid](./lib-base.readablefluid.md)

## Remarks

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `ReadableSeisFluid` class.
